mapper.select: select e.expense_sum, e.expense_memo, e.expense_date, e.expense_content, e.expense_type, m.method_type, cs.cs_name, cm.cm_name, c.card_name, ba.account_name, b.bank_name from expense e left join ex_method m on e.method_in = m.method_in left join category_sub cs on e.cs_in = cs.cs_in left join category_main cm on cs.cm_in = cm.cm_in left join card c on c.card_in = e.card_in left join bank_account ba on e.account_in = ba.account_in left join bank b on b.bank_in = ba.bank_in where e.expense_in = #{id}
